typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		submission_date as string,
		state as string,
		tot_cases as string,
		conf_cases as string,
		prob_cases as string,
		new_case as string,
		pnew_case as string,
		tot_death as string,
		conf_death as string,
		prob_death as string,
		new_death as string,
		pnew_death as string,
		created_at as string,
		consent_cases as string,
		consent_deaths as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SrcRawCoviDataAsql
source(output(
		DateKey as integer,
		Date as date,
		DayDate as integer,
		DayOfWeekName as string,
		WeekNumber as integer,
		MonthNumber as integer,
		MonthName as string,
		MonthShortName as string,
		Year as integer,
		QuarterNumber as string,
		QuarterName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM DimCalendar WHERE [Date] >= (SELECT ISNULL(MIN(CAST(submission_date AS DATE)),\'2020-01-01\') FROM RawCovidData) \nAND [Date] <= (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CAST(submission_date AS DATE)),\'2020-12-31\') FROM RawCovidData)',
	format: 'query') ~> SrcDimDate
source(output(
		StateKey as integer,
		StateCode as string,
		StateName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SrcDimState
source(output(
		CovidDataKey as integer,
		DateKey as integer,
		StateKey as integer,
		ConformedNewCases as integer,
		ProbableNewCases as integer,
		ConformedNewDeath as integer,
		ProbableNewDeath as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SrcFactCovidData
SrcRawCoviDataAsql derive(DateId = toDate(submission_date, 'MM/dd/yyyy'),
		ConformedNewCases = toInteger(iifNull(new_case, '0')) - toInteger(iifNull(pnew_case,'0')),
		ConformedNewDeath = toInteger(iifNull(new_death,'0')) - toInteger(iifNull(pnew_death,'0')),
		ProbableNewCases = toInteger(iifNull(pnew_case,'0')),
		ProbableNewDeath = toInteger(iifNull(pnew_death,'0'))) ~> DerConformedCasesAndDeath
DerConformedCasesAndDeath select(mapColumn(
		DateId,
		StateCode = state,
		ConformedNewCases,
		ProbableNewCases,
		ConformedNewDeath,
		ProbableNewDeath
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelStgColumns
CrossJoinStateCalendarToGetAllTheCombinations, SelStgColumns join(Date == DateId
	&& SrcDimState@StateCode == SelStgColumns@StateCode,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftJoinRawData
LeftJoinRawData select(mapColumn(
		DateKey,
		StateKey,
		ConformedNewCases,
		ProbableNewCases,
		ConformedNewDeath,
		ProbableNewDeath
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelRequiredColumns
SrcDimDate, SrcDimState join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CrossJoinStateCalendarToGetAllTheCombinations
SelRequiredColumns, SrcFactCovidData lookup(SelRequiredColumns@DateKey == SrcFactCovidData@DateKey
	&& SelRequiredColumns@StateKey == SrcFactCovidData@StateKey,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpFactCovid
SplitNewAndUpdatedRecords@NewRecord alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AltDefInsertUpdateCondition
LkpFactCovid select(mapColumn(
		DateKey = SelRequiredColumns@DateKey,
		StateKey = SelRequiredColumns@StateKey,
		ConformedNewCases = SelRequiredColumns@ConformedNewCases,
		ProbableNewCases = SelRequiredColumns@ProbableNewCases,
		ConformedNewDeath = SelRequiredColumns@ConformedNewDeath,
		ProbableNewDeath = SelRequiredColumns@ProbableNewDeath,
		lkp_DateKey = SrcFactCovidData@DateKey,
		lkp_StateKey = SrcFactCovidData@StateKey,
		lkp_ConformedNewCases = SrcFactCovidData@ConformedNewCases,
		lkp_ProbableNewCases = SrcFactCovidData@ProbableNewCases,
		lkp_ConformedNewDeath = SrcFactCovidData@ConformedNewDeath,
		lkp_ProbableNewDeath = SrcFactCovidData@ProbableNewDeath
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelNewAndLkpCol
SelNewAndLkpCol split(or(isNull(lkp_DateKey),isNull(lkp_StateKey)),
	(!isNull(lkp_DateKey)&&!isNull(lkp_StateKey) && (!isNull(ConformedNewCases) || !isNull(ConformedNewDeath) || !isNull(ProbableNewCases) || !isNull(ProbableNewDeath)) )&&((ConformedNewCases!=lkp_ConformedNewCases)||(ConformedNewDeath!=lkp_ConformedNewDeath)||(ProbableNewCases!=lkp_ProbableNewCases)||(ProbableNewDeath!=lkp_ProbableNewDeath)),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitNewAndUpdatedRecords@(NewRecord, UpdatedRecords)
SplitNewAndUpdatedRecords@UpdatedRecords alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AltDefInsertUpdateCondition sink(input(
		CovidDataKey as integer,
		DateKey as integer,
		StateKey as integer,
		ConformedNewCases as integer,
		ProbableNewCases as integer,
		ConformedNewDeath as integer,
		ProbableNewDeath as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		DateKey,
		StateKey,
		ConformedNewCases,
		ProbableNewCases,
		ConformedNewDeath,
		ProbableNewDeath
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SnkLoadFactCovidDate
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		CovidDataKey as integer,
		DateKey as integer,
		StateKey as integer,
		ConformedNewCases as integer,
		ProbableNewCases as integer,
		ConformedNewDeath as integer,
		ProbableNewDeath as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['DateKey','StateKey'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		DateKey,
		StateKey,
		ConformedNewCases,
		ProbableNewCases,
		ConformedNewDeath,
		ProbableNewDeath
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SinkUpdateRecords
